raw_comment:
What do you notice?
I notice that only 50 percent of men reach out to their parents through texts, while around 73 percent of women text their parents a few times a week. 
What do you wonder?
I wonder why women reach out to their parents more, is it because they are more caring?
How does this relate to you and your community?
This relates to me and my community because a lot of my piers are going away for college, and parents are expecting their children to contact them frequently. 
Create a catchy headline that captures the graphâ€™s main idea.
Call Me, Where you been?
ace_sentences: 50 percent of men text their parents.
Around 73 percent of women text their parents a few times a week.
I wonder why women reach out to their parents more than men.
I wonder whether women are more caring than men.
Many of my peers are going away for college.
Some parents expect their children to contact them frequently.
The headline is: Call me, where have you been?
